name: Reflections: In a Strange Place
description:
Travel through a strange place with your reflections. Control multiple characters simultaneously and use each mirrored perspective to navigate your way through 9 mind-bending levels. 

Sorry that there's no web build this time. Playing the game locally through the browser works fine, but there's a lot of issues with it on the web. Something that I should've checked out before there was no time left for bug fixing.
